I like nonsense. It wakes up the brain c: The trouble with having an open mind of course is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
For my part I know nothing with any certainty, but the sight of the stars makes me dream.
There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.
The important thing is to not stop questioning.
Books are a uniquely portable magic.Q00007
column5: Evil begins when you begin to treat people as things.

I like nonsense. It wakes up the brain c: Evil begins when you begin to treat people as things.
